Kanshudo_mnemonic: the black (黑) dog (犬) is silent
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The black chihuahua is never seen or heard.  He stays in the shadows and keeps silent.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " dog " to " black " sound, it means silence and silence. "Shuowen": "The dog will leave people for the time being. From the dog, the black voice. Reading like Mo." "Yi‧Xi Cishang": "Or origin or place, or silent or language."

" Silent " can mean secretly and privately. "The Analects of Confucius-Shuer": "The son said: "Knowing it silently, not tire of learning, tireless teaching, what is it to me?""

" Mo " also means seclusion and embarrassment. Jin Huanwen "Guan Qiao Yuan Yan Biao": "Although the garden is beautiful in Shangluo, it is in charge of Ning's Moliaohai. Fang Zhixiu, it is impossible to pass."

" Mo " also means darkness. Tang Gu Shenzi "Bo Yizhi•Zhang Zunyan": "Zunyan and servants waited under the big hidden tree. At the time, they were dim and silent."

" Mo " also refers to dictation. Yuan Mei's "Suiyuan Poetry Talk" Volume 7: "Cai Xiaolian has Xu Cuiling in Tsing Yi, who looks like a beautiful woman. She has a great memory. He has tasted dyeing workshops and burned his books. A certain color and its value are not bad at all."
humanum_short_description_en: From " dog " to " black " sound, it means silence and silence.
humanum_full_description:
從「犬」，「黑」聲，表示靜默、不語。《說文》：「犬暫逐人也。从犬，黑聲。讀若墨。」《易‧繫辭上》：「或出或處，或默或語。」

　　「默」可表示暗暗、私下。《論語‧述而》：「子曰：『默而識之，學而不厭，誨人不倦，何有於我哉？』」

　　「默」也表示隱居、困窘。晉桓溫〈薦譙元彥表〉：「雖園綺之棲商洛，管寧之默遼海。方之於秀，殆無以過。」

　　「默」還表示黑暗。唐谷神子《博异志‧張遵言》：「遵言與僕等隱大樹下。於時昏晦，默無所睹。」

　　「默」亦指默寫。清袁枚《隨園詩話》卷七：「蔡孝廉有青衣許翠齡，貌如美女而夭。記性絕佳，嘗過染坊，戲焚其簿，坊主大駭。翠齡笑取筆為默出之，某家染某色及其價值，絲毫不差。」
humanum_short_description: 從「犬」，「黑」聲，表示靜默、不語。

從「 犬 」，「 黑 」聲，表示靜默、不語。《說文》：「犬暫逐人也。从犬，黑聲。讀若墨。」《易‧繫辭上》：「或出或處，或默或語。」 「 默 」可表示暗暗、私下。《論語‧述而》：「子曰：『默而識之，學而不厭，誨人不倦，何有於我哉？』」 「 默 」也表示隱居、困窘。晉桓溫〈薦譙元彥表〉：「雖園綺之棲商洛，管寧之默遼海。方之於秀，殆無以過。」 「 默 」還表示黑暗。唐谷神子《博异志‧張遵言》：「遵言與僕等隱大樹下。於時昏晦，默無所睹。」 「 默 」亦指默寫。清袁枚《隨園詩話》卷七：「蔡孝廉有青衣許翠齡，貌如美女而夭。記性絕佳，嘗過染坊，戲焚其簿，坊主大駭。翠齡笑取筆為默出之，某家染某色及其價值，絲毫不差。」
From " dog" to " black" sound, it means silence and silence. "Shuowen": "The dog will leave people for the time being. From the dog, the black voice. Reading like Mo." "Yi‧Xi Cishang": "Or origin or place, or silent or language." " Silent" can mean secretly and privately. "The Analects of Confucius-Shuer": "The son said: "Knowing it silently, not tire of learning, tireless teaching, what is it to me?"" " Mo" also means seclusion and embarrassment. Jin Huanwen "Guan Qiao Yuan Yan Biao": "Although the garden is beautiful in Shangluo, it is in charge of Ning's Moliaohai. Fang Zhixiu, it is impossible to pass." " Mo" also means darkness. Tang Gu Shenzi "Bo Yizhi•Zhang Zunyan": "Zunyan and servants waited under the big hidden tree. At the time, they were dim and silent." " Mo" also refers to dictation. Yuan Mei's "Suiyuan Poetry Talk" Volume 7: "Cai Xiaolian has Xu Cuiling in Tsing Yi, who looks like a beautiful woman. She has a great memory. He has tasted dyeing workshops and burned his books. A certain color and its value are not bad at all."

默字的基本解释

默
mò
不说话，不出声：默认。默写。默许。默哀。默诵。默读。默悼。默契。沉默。默默无闻。

默字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mò］
［《廣韻》莫北切，入德，明。］
亦作“黙1”。
(1)静默；不语。
(2)暗暗；私下。
(3)隐居；困窘。
(4)黑暗。
(5)默写。
(6)方言。思考。
(7)通“墨”。贪污。
(8)通“驀”。忽然，突然。
(9)姓。明有默思道。见《万姓统谱·入职》。

默字的英文翻译

◎ 默
silent, tacit, write from memory

默字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【黑字部】　默； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1519第11
【唐韻】亡北切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】密北切，?音墨。【說文】犬暫逐人也。　又【廣韻】黑也。　又靜也，幽也，不語也。【易·繫辭】君子之道，或默或語。【書·說命】恭默思道。　又姓。【姓譜】明有默思道。　又或作嘿。【前漢·成帝紀】臨朝淵嘿。　又或作墨。【前漢·竇嬰傳】墨墨不得志。　又或作?。【前漢·東方朔傳】吳王?然。　又叶莫卜切，音木。【楚辭·九章】眴兮杳杳，孔靜幽默。鬱結紆軫兮，離慜而長鞠。　通作繆脉脈。

默字的源字形

默字的起名意思

：指文静；幽静；冒、涌；私下、暗中。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mò］
["Guangyun" Mo Beiqie, enter the German, Ming. ]
Also known as "黙1".
(1) Silence; silent.
(2) Secretly; privately.
(3) Seclusion; embarrassment.
(4) Darkness.
(5) Silent writing.
(6) Dialects. Thinking.
(7) Through "ink". corruption.
(8) Through "蓦". Suddenly, suddenly.
(9) Last name. Obviously meditation. See "Ten Thousand Surnames · Entry".
